price: Akka kanatti murtii Arabiffaa ta’ee isa (Qur’aana) buufne. Ati odoo fedha lubbuu isaanii hordoftee erga beekumsa irraa (wanti siif kenname) sitti dhufee booda, (adabbii) Rabbii irraa tumsaafi tiksaan siif hin jiru.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ حُكۡمًا عَرَبِيّٗاۚ وَلَئِنِ ٱتَّبَعۡتَ أَهۡوَآءَهُم بَعۡدَ مَا جَآءَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡعِلۡمِ مَا لَكَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِيّٖ وَلَا وَاقٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika anzalnāhu ḥuk'man ʿarabiyyan wala-ini ittabaʿta ahwāahum baʿdamā jāaka mina al-ʿil'mi mā laka mina al-lahi min waliyyin walā wāqin
